data.name: CRETE
data.detailed_description:
Discover the biopunk planet of Kepler0 in a solo, competitive or cooperative experience, Fight against the Ancestors and other bizarre creatures. Use their DNA to build your own procedural weapons, find a friend and combine your abilities to be even more powerful.
The further you go, the better rewards and DNA you will get for the next run. Dying is not the end, a clone of yourself is waiting for your next life, and if you did a good hunt, now you will become stronger.


CRETE is a bizarre and transcendental universe and art that talks about transhumanism through the eyes of Demian, Chrys and Kromer, involved in a epic fight against the Ancestors.
Get ready for Intense combats, a sense of constant danger, enigmatic towers and labyrinths, lost artefacts, a changing lving world, a unique mythology and a story that will unfold the further you go to the North East of Kepler0.



Solo, cooperative, competitive, locally, in the network. You choose how you want to discover Kepler0. You will get access to 6 families of abilities: Melee, Range, Breaker, Finisher, Tactical and Streamer. You can use DNA and blueprints to build your own custom setup for the battlefield. However, that won't be enough... you need to think how to use and combine these skills in order to defeat your enemies, or at least, to survive from them.



Dying is just a transition to your next yourself. And you will die, 100%. However, you have the chance of saving your rewards before your death and come back stronger, smarter and more prepared. It all depends of how many risks you want to take for the rewards you want to take.



You won't play the same world two times. From procedural mountains, to foggy lakes and dangerous cliffs, CRETE is a living world where you will need to be always alert. Maybe something dangerous is waiting for you behind that rock.

data.short_description: Fight against the Ancestors and other biopunk creatures. Use their DNA to build your own procedural weapons, find a friend and combine your skills to be even more powerful. The further you go, the better rewards you will get for the next run. It is up to you to reveal what is up there in the north.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2400 / AMD CPU with 4 physical cores @ 3Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 670 2GB / AMD Radeon R9 280 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-2600K / AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 390X or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: While a big part of the game is around the exploration and discovery, combat situations can get violent in different grades depending on your style of gameplay.
